== Coding standard ==

We've released the coding standard for eZ Community. For those of you who want to contribute with the development of eZ Community this is the way you must format your code.

The document describes how the PHP code should be formatted, naming conventions and things like that. You can download it here: 

* eZ Community 2 Coding Standard : [http://ezcommunity.net/filemanager/download/44/php_codingstandard.pdf php_codingstandard.pdf] Size: 163.94 KB 

* eZ publish 3 Coding Standard : [http://ezcommunity.net/filemanager/download/47/ez_coding_standards_v3.pdf ez_coding_standards_v3.pdf]

* eZ Community [http://ezcommunity.net/filemanager/list/25/ Coding Standards]

References: 
* [http://web.archive.org/web/20020826204438/developer.ez.no/article/articleview/103/1/1/ eZ publish 2 coding standard]
* [http://ez.no/ez_publish/documentation/development/standards/php eZ publish 3 coding standard]
